00026 class GCException {

00035 class GC {
00036 public:
00039   GC(): refCount(0) {
00040   }
00041 
00044   virtual ~GC() {
00045         refCount = 0;
00046   }
00047 
00050   void UpCount() {
00051         refCount++;
00052   }
00053 
00058   void DwCount() {
00059           if ((--refCount) == 0) {
00060                   delete this;
00061           }
00062   }
00063 
00064 private:
00066         unsigned int refCount;
00067 };

00075 template<typename T> class SPtr {
00076 public:
00083         SPtr<T>(T* p = 0) {
00084                 pointer = p; if (pointer != 0) pointer->UpCount();
00085         }
00086 
00093         SPtr<T>(const SPtr<T>& rhs) {
00094                 pointer = rhs.pointer; if (pointer != 0) pointer->UpCount();
00095         }
00096 
00101         virtual ~SPtr<T>() {
00102                 if (pointer != 0) pointer->DwCount(); pointer = 0;
00103         }
00104 
00107         virtual operator T* () const {
00108                 return pointer;
00109         }
00110 /*
00111         template<class S> operator SPtr<S> () {
00112                 return SPtr<S>(pointer);
00113         }
00114 */
00115 
00120   virtual T& operator * () const {
00121                 if (pointer != 0) return (*pointer);
00122                 throw GCException();
00123         }
00124 
00129         virtual T* operator -> () const {
00130                 if (pointer != 0) return pointer;
00131                 throw GCException();
00132         }
00133 
00145   SPtr<T>& operator = (const SPtr<T>& rhs) {
00146                 if (this != (&rhs)) {
00147                         if (pointer != 0) pointer->DwCount();
00148                         pointer = rhs.pointer;
00149                         if (pointer != 0) pointer->UpCount();
00150                 }
00151                 return (*this);
00152         }
00153 
00154 protected:
00156         T* pointer;
00157 };

00166 template<typename T> class NZSPtr: public SPtr<T> {
00167 public:
00175         NZSPtr<T>(T* p): SPtr<T>(p) {
00176                 if (p == 0) {
00177                         throw GCException();
00178                 }
00179         }
00180 
00188         NZSPtr<T>(const SPtr<T>& rhs): SPtr<T>(rhs) {
00189                 if (rhs == 0) {
00190                         throw GCException();
00191                 }
00192         }
00193 
00200         NZSPtr<T>(const NZSPtr<T>& rhs) {
00201                 this->pointer = rhs.pointer; this->pointer->UpCount();
00202         }
00203 
00208         virtual ~NZSPtr<T>() {
00209         }
00210 
00221   NZSPtr<T>& operator = (const NZSPtr<T>& rhs) {
00222                 if (this != (&rhs)) {
00223                         this->pointer->DwCount();
00224                         this->pointer = rhs.pointer;
00225                         this->pointer->UpCount();
00226                 }
00227                 return (*this);
00228         }
00229 
00241   bool operator < (const NZSPtr<T>& rhs) const {
00242     return ((*(this->pointer)) < (*rhs));
00243         }
00244 };
